name: Jest Tests with Coverage

on:
  push:
    paths:
      - 'services/**'
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]
    paths:
      - 'services/**'

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
    - name: Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
    - name: Setup Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v4
      with:
        node-version: '20'
        cache: 'npm'
        
    - name: Install dependencies
      run: npm ci
      working-directory: ./services/score-service
      
    - name: Run Jest tests with coverage
      uses: ArtiomTr/jest-coverage-report-action@v2
      with:
        working-directory: ./services/score-service
        package-manager: npm
        test-script: test
        coverage-threshold-branches: 80
        coverage-threshold-functions: 80
        coverage-threshold-lines: 80
        coverage-threshold-statements: 80
        github-token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
